channel.title: Tor download complete & installed .. but wait ..
channel.description:
Hi,
I downloaded the tor software using the shortcut on the desktop.
It showed that it downloaded and installed correctly.
After that I open the tor browser on the tor icon, only to be told that I have still not downloaded tor ??
What gives ? I just watched it install itself ?
am I perhaps not opening it correctly ?
Thanks H

item.title: Tor download complete & installed .. but wait ..
item.dc:creator: Anon007
item.description:
I originally install VirtualBox on my flash (portable) but had a suspicion it was causing all the issues.
After reinstalling everything the problem seems to have gone.
Thanks
